codeTemplates.deleteTable: IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[{{=it.entity.defKey}}]') AND type in (N'U')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[{{=it.entity.defKey}}];
